content.text:
# Filmfare Critics Award for Best Telugu Film

The Filmfare Critics Award for Best Film Telugu is given by the Filmfare Magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for South Indian films. It was decided on 58th Annual Filmfare Awards and started from 2010. It acknowledges an encourages the filmmakers of a direction department. From 2011 Critics Award for Best film Started but its irregularly. In 2022 Critics Award for Best film become regularly in all four languages.
